modName: Tutorial - Create anything into standalone and craftable
descriptionHtml:
Its just a guide for people who want to learn easy with exactly steps.

***I deleted the first uploaded file because i forgot to remove some wrong steps in the first part which was saying something to do like in video.
When i decided not to make a video tutorial but only a writen, i forgot to correct those steps.
Now the corrected file is up, those who have the previous file, please delete it and download the new one, i'm really sorry for my mistake, happy moding.***

Sorry no video tutorial, my antivirus thinks that the program Fraps has a virus and it blocked the exe file, which this program can record anything and make screenshots.

About the retexturing part of the guide, in case you don't know how to use Photoshop or Gimp to retexture a texture "dds file", sorry but i can't explain the whole Photoshop or Gimp program, you have to find a fine tutorial about those programs, writen or recored.

About the Photoshop dds Plugins, if you already have installed photoshop, download and install this:
https://developer.nv...adobe-photoshop
If you have 32bit pc/windows then download then click on 32-bit, if you have 64bit then click on 64-bit, this will add the dds plugins to photoshop and then can open the textures.

Good luck and have fun! ^^

Permmisions:
1) Users are not allowed to edit and upload my file to other sites since i spent hours to use the programs carefully and write the steps of the tutorial!
2) Translations are allowed, no need to ask me.Â 
[b][i][u]3) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my mods on Steam Workshop as their own to obtain money, my mods will always stay on nexus for free!
[/u][/i][/b]
